message: Let's start with a fair split. I think this is a good starting point.
I think we can do better than a 60/40 split.  Let's aim for something closer to even.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, but I'm open to negotiating.
I understand you want a bigger share, Bob. Let's compromise a bit. I'm offering a 55/45 split in my favor. This way, we both get a decent share and avoid losing more to inflation.
I appreciate your compromise, Alice. I'm willing to go down to a 55/45 split in my favor.  Let's try to settle this before we lose even more to inflation.
